name: Valtoria Jackson
text: A refreshing gathering of saints with an anointed leader preaching Truth and In the Spirit. All persons are welcomed!!

name: Mecco Harris_Gourdine
text: I have had several church families but Engaged Christian Church rocks. It sizzles with a family feel and is overflowing with the love of God. The youth church is inviting for all ages and makes the word of God come alive for the youth to understand. You can tell that Pastor G is a student of the word by the unadulterated word of truth that he shares with the side of the Holy Spirit!!! It's old school church with a new school flavor but never compromising the word of God!!! If you haven't come to visit you should make your way to 2877 Mcgehee Rd on Sunday morning at 10. Our oldest member is 90 and our youngest is 3months old. Get Engaged!!!!

name: Shahari Pierce
text: This is a great church with kind and friendly people. They also have great youth programs.

name: Sidney Peagler
text: Pastor Gordine is 1of the greatest shepherds delivering the word of God.  So come on out and join in fellowship and worshiping . McGhee Rd next door to Renfros grocery.  Look forward to seeing you there.  Stay blessed.

name: lukky7 Nupe
text: Very friendly group enjoyed Sunday School

name: Oscar Webster
text: Very good.

name: Mike Weathers
text: Everyone should visit here,the pastor is as good as they come

name: DGT 101610
text: Montevallo First Baptist Church is a member of the Southern Baptist Convention. They have a small, but friendly congregation. Visitors will be pleased with the family like environment and the Spiritual worship set presented by the Music Ministry. The pastor, Dr. Terry Sutton, is highly qualified and facilitates individual as well as congregational Spiritual growth and development. Leadership in the Church is committee-based, members being selected from among the congregation. An excellent environment for children to grow in the Lord.

name: Lisa Hall
text: Excellent home for Christians! Good preacher, super nice people, good music!!

name: Kelly Garrett
text: Such a great church for all ages! Great programs for children, youth, college, families, and seniors!

name: Jim Taylor
text: This church really cares about people !

name: Teresa Payne
text: Very nice people with great sermon.

name: Tessa Burns
text: Love my church family!

name: Scott Gillies
text: Such an awesome Pastor and staff! An amazing church h to be a part of!

name: Gatlin Mole
text: Amazing worship. Pastor is the nicest and Best guy you will ever meet.

name: Jennifer McClure
text: Really good people

name: Edgard Padilla
text: I liked it

name: Shanika Ogburn
text:
This church is truly awesome! I felt the Holy Spirit the moment I stepped in. I heard of the church after enrolling my daughter in their summer camp and private school. I'm so excited for her to be a part of the school where God and academia are both very important. I was thrilled to see that what I saw in the church is the same thing I saw in the school. The people are loving and welcoming, and aren't afraid to show their love for God. If you visit this church feeling heavy and leave the same way, you missed something! I know because I moved here to Alabama at the worst time of my life and I felt encouragement and the joy of God just from two visits. Try it for yourself! I'll definitely be returning.
Also, they have children's church!

name: Janet Faustmann
text: The Pastors of this church truly love God and love people. They teach the Bible. The true word of God.   The Pastors and members here   care for each other and care for the local community.  That love, care, and sharing of Jesus is also carried into other countries of the world.    My family and I are truly blessed to be a part of this church.

name: Sandra Webber
text: I have been a member since 2012.  If you want to learn more about getting closer to God, come here.  The music is fantastic and the pastors are great.  They teach things that you can relate to and definitely apply to your every day life.

name: Sammie Laster
text: The pillars of Worshipping Jesus and Declaring His Word (over your own life as well as the lives of others) is foundational here.  If you want the "Good Food" of God's Word while enjoying His Presence....come visit AND stay!

name: Samantha Bagwell
text: If you want to hear the true word of God, look no further. If you want to be among believers who love God, look no further. This is a great church and a great family.

name: Jennifer Berisford
text: We love the genuine heart of the pastors as well as the involvement in local and world missions.   Fantastic children's miniseries, and freedom to choose from multiple small groups of all kinds.

name: Diana Hase
text: Valley is not just a great church.  It's our family!  Come worship with us and experience the tangible transforming love of Jesus,  the manifest presence of the Holy Spirit bringing peace and healing, the power of God the  Father sustaining  and keeping us and giving hope .

name: Heather Killinger
text: Valley Fellowship has been a blessing to my family. It's a safe place for families to go to share their lives together. I would absolutely recommend to all of my friends.

name: Amanda Woodson
text: Come be a part of a church that welcomes you like family. With a heart for missions, Christian Education and a love for people, Valley Fellowship is a true blessing to Huntsville Alabama.

name: Emerson Bradley
text: Someone had told us about Valley Fellowship Church so we went to visit.  It was like a light had been turned on.  We had never seen worship like that before and the prayer and ministry was just amazing.

name: Bernadette Thomas
text: I've been coming here for decades, even before the current pastor was there, but I joined the night that I first heard them preach there. They were so good I wanted to be a permanent part of that.

name: Sam Hobsin
text: I love the ministry here. It speaks right to me and hits on a personal level.

name: Harry Ronstead
text: I have been attending Valley Fellowship Church for about 9 years now.  They have excellent ministry to meet individual needs of others.  I would highly recommend them to friends and family, and have.

name: Margaret Peters
text: You cannot find a pastor with more integrity. This place just has something special about it that I love.

name: Wesley Church
text: There's a great group of people at Valley Fellowship! Great praise and worship

name: Cara Goodwin
text: Valley Fellowship Church has been my home church for the last 29 years.  I have found family here that has nothing to do with blood.  We have lived here together, through weddings, births, funerals and everything in between.

name: Alison Harvey
text: They truly care about salvation. They want people to live with God in all ways.

name: Chris Brown
text: Valley Fellowship Church is closer than family to me!

name: Tiuana Thomas
text: My first time attending the church was awesome. I was encouraged by some family members to attend the family and friends day! My first experience was Immaculate, from the pastors to the members. Each and every one of them treated me like family. I enjoy the church so much because I was receiving what I was looking for and that was a teacher to provided the full understanding of Christ and our purpose as Christian people! Thanks, pastor Evan Roland for giving me guidance, light and showing me how to pray when we are going through our up and down seasons. I would differently recommend family, friends, and colleagues to attend Life Changers Christian Church you will receive an experience you will never forget!

name: Brandon McCray
text: Wonderful place to worship and be considered family. The daycare is also top notch and a great staff.

name: verna pates
text: Always a Word that is needed at the time, people celebrate you not tolerate you, timely yet quench not The Holy Spirit, and praise is a true worship experience...

text: This is a wonderful place to worship! The members are great and the Bishop is exceptional!!!

text: Great church. Loving, gospel minded, Jesus following congregation. Great preaching& bible teaching, family friendly, active youth ministry, community outreach & involvement, & great music, too!

text: Statements made by the receptionist who facilitated the tour, we're insulting and personally hurtful. Her visual observations should be kept to herself and shared with the staff as need to knows for the betterment of my child versus choosing to use an open forum of the admitting office in front of others. Not to mention her observation is not valued or wanted, seeing that she does not hold not one certification in childcare development.

text: My kids went to preschool here years ago. My wife and I returned tonight for her dodgeball tournament. Yep adult dodgeball. It was awesome and no one got seriously injured. The facilities were great.

text: Pastor Thomas has the true Christian spirit of service to all members of the community, and feeds the hungry. He has reached out to the homeless, the elderly and less fortunate. The church delivers meals to the hungry. This is what ALL churches should strive to be. So much is accomplished because of the volunteers and the vision of Pastor Thomas.

name: Michelle Riggs
text: This is our home church and our church family. You could not ask for a better group of people. If you're looking for a church I highly suggest a visit here.

name: rain storm
text: God bless the Bullock ministry. Discovered them on Sid Roth. I graduated from school of ministry. Their teachings are on even meatier study in the word of God  Just became partners. My gifts as a teacher prophet and using my gifts have blossomed. These are true worshippers that propheticalky speak the bold truth of God. Also using gifts of healing in Jesus name. Can't wait to visit Church International. Love and pray for you Robins, Christa, Amber John family and ministry.

name: Sunshine Frogs
text:
Such a blessing  to learn from this wonderful  team and family 💙 I watch online here from California, I hope to visit in person someday.
Such  a prophetic  and spirit  filled service. God bless them all!

name: Pa Girl
text: These folks are bold and fearless! They stand on the foundation of the Word and God's promises. There is life in this place and the Spirit of God is continually present. You will be blessed, encouraged,convicted and enlightened! They expose the truths that had been lost to religion and man's doctrine and set a course back to learning the true nature of God and the LORD and His perfect will. Reminding us always that, "God is absolutely good!"

name: Diana Lee
text: I have only visited on line, yet i am continually stirred by the revelation that comes from this true prophetic ministry from the Kingdom of God revealed. It feels like a pipeline from the Fathers Heart to us. I so desire more of God and to walk in my birthright as a child of the most high God. The love and conviction of God are very evident. I thank  Jesus for these gifts.

name: Theresa Parsons
text: Brother Robin and the Prayer petitions team are truly Godly Gifted prohetics and Blessed.

name: Amy Bean
text: Nice Church. Very welcoming

name: Tom McGraw
text: I enjoy the Holy Spirit filled, Bible based teaching and preaching. Awesome praise and worship! I highly recommend this church. Friday Night Fire is a prophetic service by Apostle Robin D. Bullock with great teaching and prophetic insight. Pastor Robin R. Bullock preaches and teaches the Word on Sunday morning! We drive almost two hours to service. Well worth the drive and the time spent. Growing spirituality by leaps and bounds.

name: The Story Lady
text: The Tuesday prayer service is so personal and empowering.  Try to never miss a Tuesday.  Keep it coming Church International.   We love you.

text: Powerful church of God, the presence of the lord is here, Jesus is glorified.

name: Lynn burke
text:
God is absolutely good
Friendly place

name: Leslie Racine
text: No more milk and cookies, this ministry is Meat and Good for the bones. Great team and great teaching of the Word of the Lord. Be filled, Amen.

name: Peter James
text: Simply Amazing services. Thanks so much for going online.

name: Allie Field
text: I am home everytime I enter the doors for worship. This is a place where everyone there is pure love.  The Robin's, the worship team, and staff are full of the love of God I don't know how to Express it.

name: Daniel Field
text: The people at this church are very loving, and it is also a place where the Holy Spirit is allowed to move. And where the Word of God is really taught, and preached.

name: K. Gibson
text: Wonderful pastor & apostle & prophecy of the Lord. Wonderful members who make you feel a part of the family, wonderful music and I love the prayer team. The Holy Spirit is in this place. You guys should get a twitter I can follow since I've given up facebook.

name: Zach Millar
text: Holy Ghost fire!!!!! Run devil run!!!! Hosanna in the highest glory to the King of kings and Lord of lords!!! Amazing place to worship and learn the Word of God!!! Amazing place to learn how to operate in the 9 gifts of the Holy Ghost!!!

name: Frank Hollis

name: Debbie Duguid
text: This Prophetic voice, Prophet Robin D. Bullock is one of the most prolific, profound Bible Teachers I have ever heard. His study and divine revelation of the Word captivates you and causes you to hunger and dig into the Word for yourself.  His wife, Pastor Robin Bullock, has such a heart to Shepard the flock God has given her. This precious couple is a no nonsense, preacher and teacher of the TRUTH of God's Word and they are preparing the Body of Christ for the End Times through a no compromise, tell it like it is biblical, non-compromising message that is an absolute must in the prophetic time we are living.  I drove from NC to Church International in Warrior, Alabama where Prophet Robin and Pastor Robin are leaders over that Body of Believers and I met many that attend their Church and these are beautiful, precious, loving, caring people.  Church International in Warrior, Alabama is a Body of precious people that truly love God and love others.

text: My grandparents were members of this church when I was little. My grandpa played guitar in the church band. I remember one of my aunt's getting married there, and Saturday June 30th, I will be getting married there as well!! The members of this church are all simply amazing!!!

text: I love TOB! The Olive Branch Christian Church is one of my favorite churches in Hunttsville. I enjoy going on Friday Nights and Saturday nights where we learn about Yeshua, our messiah. The people are the nicest people you'll ever meet. They will welcome you as part of the family, no matter what background you have or where you came from. It's one of the most welcoming place around. I highly recommend a visit here!

resp.text: We love you, Audrey!

name: Darlene Hacker
text: Every Sunday my husband and I  are so very blessed to hear the goodness of God through CHurch Unlimited!!!! They are all about Jesus! Birmingham is way beyond blessed to have Pastor Brandon and Abbe ministering the love, total forgiveness, and the perfect completeness of the finished work of Christ's RIghteousness every Sunday!!! I have lived way too long under" get your behavior right then your life will change"....No No No...Know and understand the agape love of God through Jesus  and you will be radically changed...a heart transformation is what I am talking about!!!! I pray you will attend or tune in each Sunday to their "all about Jesus" sermons and you will will not be satisfied with anything less!!!

text: Columbiana UMC is a welcoming, non judgmental church open to all who desire to worship.

name: Vicki Horton
text: VBS 2017 is the greatest!

name: David Williams
text: Was invited to a limited opening during the covid pandemic. The people were very friendly,  and the message was great. The music was fantastic! Can't wait for church to open up full capacity.

name: Gregorio Santana
text: I've been a member of Ridge now four years . I'm a Traveller but this is my home church. Trip our pastor is amazing and our members are too. This church has reshaped my life all around to be the best I can be. Thank you ridge for the lessons but most of always being family. Love y'all

name: Debi Dean
text: Our family loves worshiping and serving at Ridge!  The way these people love on others and reach out to both believers and those who are searching is beautiful.  We're so blessed to be a part of Ridge and are looking forward to seeing where God takes this church next!

name: Brandi Myrick
text: My family loves serving and being a part of Ridge Church. This church loves the people of Elmore County and the surrounding area. They want More For You! I highly recommend visiting Ridge Church.

name: Amy Willis
text: My husband and I started attending Ridge Church the day they re-launched at the Wetumpka High School. We felt welcomed from the moment we pulled in the parking lot. Ridge has a great team of leaders, their families included. Worship team is amazing. We have found OUR church.

name: vanessa rhodes
text: I have loved Ridge Church since I walked in the doors a year and 3 months ago. The people are amazing and accept you as you are. We are super excited for relaunch. I know God has big plans for our church.

name: Eva Taylor
text: When you visit and find yourself feeling that you are a part of a bigger family, where  you are  able to grow in your relationship with Christ,  when you have a prayer request, and know it  will be prayed for, when you need encouragement, and know where to find it..you have found Ridge Church! Loves all ages, reaches out to the community, supports missions, and loves your family..this just might be the church for you! It was and still is for my family.

name: Katie Campbell
text: Ridge Church is so special to our family. We love this church and the many people we get to serve with each week! God is doing amazing things through the people of this church and we are more than thankful to be a part of it!

name: Laura Adams
text: My kids love going to Ridge Kids, and we love the friendly, casual atmosphere. Great music, and sermons that give you hope.

name: Lindsey Sanford
text: My family and I love serving at Ridge Church! The message is always rooted in scripture and the people are so friendly and genuine!

name: Crystal Collins (Crystal)
text: We love Ridge Church!  I love how they love people regardless of past faults or even current situations.

name: Jeremy Moncrief
text: Awesome message,music.  Authentic love from an amazing church

name: Milissa Gainey
text: I loved this church, I was sad when I moved to church. They were, nice, welcoming and treated us like family.

name: Trip Healey
text: We had no idea the impact Ridge Church would not only have on this community, but also on our family when we launched in September of 2013.  We have moved to Wetumpka High School on Sundays at 9 & 10:30am!

name: 李心
text: Love this church so much!  Even make me wanna move to USA!

name: Anita Barrett
text: We have been serving in the nursery almost every Sunday since launch.  We love Ridge Church!

name: Spotted Saint
text: They seem to love the Lord ,but they don't appear to want to embrace the ENTIRE Word (both Old and New Testaments) as God's Word. When I questioned them online about certain theological issues they don't do political issues.  Fair enough. It wasn't about politics, but I can't go to a church that cherry picks only certain scriptures because some of them don't line up with what's agreeable to them. I'm not saying that they don't love Jesus,  but the ENTIRE Word of God is for the body of Christ and must be received as such. To do otherwise is dangerous. I'll be praying for them.

name: Andy
text:
I walked into this church for the first time and was met with a great worship experience. I sang my guts out in worship and praise of Jesus and felt lucky to have the lead male singer sit behind me.

Little did I know that I wasn’t very lucky at all.

Just as Pastor Jimbo was teaching about the Great Commission (go into the world, meaning other countries as well), in a sermon about how we as Christians are call to create healthy environments for people to grow in Christ and to evangelize by creating fulfilling relationships....

This worship leader whispered to his girlfriend, pointing to me, saying “Is that a Mexican?” in a negative, hateful tone.

His girlfriend (Jessica?) then also pointed and whispered the same thing to her friend. “I think that’s a Mexican right there.”

I did not grow closer to God from that, nor was it a healthy environment, nor was that an example of bringing people closer to God through healthy and nurturing relationships.

And to think that this racism came from the lead worship singer, the person I was singing along with to revel in my faith and give glory to God.

As I looked around, I noticed that I was literally the only person in this small nondenominational community church who wasn’t completely white.

But I definitely felt like the most Christian and the most American.

Somebody reached out and as he heard my story he apologized to me, but then tried to make the excuse of “This is Birmingham in the Deep South, we’re not going to be perfect.”

Non-whites beware.

Racists are a tiny minority both in this city, in this state, and in this country — but when you find a community who accepts it as a normality... Just run.

That is not Christian, and it’s not where you should bring any friends you reach out to.

name: Victoria Hunter
text: This is my first time here and I Like it!! Enjoying a Nice Evening with my kids, Having a Great time here watching Them play and having fun with other Kids!!! Happy Holloween to Everyone....

name: Rachel Petry
text: We love this church! Tied to Northpoint (Buckhead/Andy Stanley)... we feel at home!

name: Tina Roehm
text: Love my church and my church family. I cant wait to come back to my church family.

name: Linda Martin
text: Wonderful church family... exciting place to be. The people are so loving and friendly. Check this one out if you need a church in Greenville, AL.

name: Jan Moreno
text: Wonderful  worship, PRAISE, alive and anointing preaching.

name: Raquel Jackson
text: Pastor Damon and Lady Melissa are two of the most amazing people I've met since living here in Birmingham. Their team is awesome and they always are so genuine and loving! God is intentional and He knew exactly what He was doing when He sent me there. Love these people of God to pieces!

resp.text: Thanks Raquel! The feeling is mutual. God knows how to bring the right people together for the right purpose. We are so glad you are with us!

name: Christina James
text: If you are looking to experience authentic love and relationships between believers, something new and refreshing, bible-based teaching, and opportunities to strengthen your faith and yourself as a follower of Christ.... one word: visit. You won't leave the same.  You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Thanks for your support Christina. We love having you a part of our ministry.

name: Malissa Davis
text: It's such a cool atmosphere! The worship was great and the people are so loving and kind. Not to mention they feed you after service and have a great time for fellowshipping. The word is solid and very practical for your everyday life. So cool - can't wait to go back next Sunday!

name: Bonita Weaver
text: I had a lovely time.  Everyone was so warm and welcoming.  I really enjoyed the message and the sermon by Pastor Damon.  I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Hi Bonita, thanks for taking a moment to share your thoughts. We're happy to know your experience was positive. We enjoyed you as well. We'd love to see you again!

name: Louis Parks
text: Awesome teaching! The Pastor and his wife have a genuine heart for loving and connecting with people.

name: Steven Moore
text: If you want to experience the Love of Jesus you should attend this Church. The teaching is biblically sound and the members exemplify a loving attitude, and excellent place to grow spiritually.

name: jackee bishop
text: Love it

name: Tony Miller
text: Family oriented, very friendly and welcoming!!!!  Really enjoyed the service!!!!

name: Pamela Hance
text: The most friendly, concerned people you will ever meet.

name: Dominic Sclafani
text: Big church small Chapel

name: Harrison Bell
text: Awesome children’s and youth programming!

resp.text: Thank you! We certainly agree!

name: Van Free
text: A church where everyone is welcome. The church offers Traditional and Contemporary Services. Dynamic youth programs  for all ages. Their worship services are geared toward bringing you closer to Jesus Christ.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Amen Van! Thank you!

(Original)
Amen Van! Thank you!

name: Deborah Wise
text: Very much enjoyed the sermon by the Senior Pastor. It was something that I need to apply to my life everyday. He was very friendly to myself and my family.

resp.text: Thank you Deborah! We are blessed to be lead by our amazing pastors! It's a wonderful thing to learn and grow together.

name: Joe Rutland
text:
MY CHURCH! A very good place to be!
Godly, biblical teaching!
LOVE THE PLACE!

name: Marisol Visger
text: Super Beautiful and very friendly atmosphere 🥰

resp.text: Thank you Marisol! We are regular people who try to show Jesus more than ourselves. (He's Super friendly! We aren't all morning people, but Jesus is good All the time! Lol!)

name: Samuel S. Rainer, Jr.
text: Such amazing saints go to this church

resp.text: What a blessing! Thank you Samuel! Could you tell us what you loved most and maybe something we could improve?

name: Jeff F
text: Wonderful church all the way around!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jeff! We'd love to hear about your experience!

name: Christina Vaughn
text: Love this church, always has a great message

resp.text: We try! God loves working through His people! So glad you came and we hope to connect with you more!

name: Khyati Naik
text: We have decided to go with this daycare by seeing Google reviews but the experience was totally different. My 19 MO daughter was in class with only one teacher and 12 kids total for the whole week.(The first and also the last week). Her teacher was very kind by nature, but practically it’s impossible to manage 12 kids by one person. She was sick and missed few weeks of the daycare. When we went back I was little late I went there around 10:21, I was turned back by the director saying that it was close to nap time and I cannot drop her off. I was not expecting this. And we decided not to send her back after this experience. I would not recommend this daycare to any one. Luckily with grace of god my daughter only attended the first week and we decided not to send her back. We had a very bad experience, poor management.

name: Andrew Licausi (Drew)
text: The people here are nothing shy of amazing! And father Doug is fully walking in God's light! So genuine in his faith and love, it's so refreshing to be a part of it!

name: Elizabeth Summerville
text: Did a tour, was not impressed. Teachers, not that experience. Let children cry to the top of their lungs as I observe in different rooms.  They need a better strategy. Kids nose running sitting in the high tops next to other kids, that's the most easiest way for Children to get sick and pass germs.. Just did not get a good vibe. I'll keep looking.

name: Kei Kakes
text: My son attended and mow my daughter. They just get better and better. I love this childcare center.

name: Me
text: Such sweet people!

name: Wanda Trepanier
text: Good  people

name: Richard Ward
text: The Gospel!
